message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out, Alice. This is a fair deal, take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'm not giving up yet, let's compromise!
Okay Alice, let's be real. This is the final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest and we both lose if this falls through.
